FuncDef: The hwtacacs-server source-ip command specifies the source IPv4 address used by a device to communicate with an HWTACACS server. The undo hwtacacs-server source-ip command cancels the configuration. By default, the device uses the IP address of the actual outbound interface as the source IP address of HWTACACS packets.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies an IP address.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Specifies the IP address of a VLANIF interface as the source address for communication between the device and HWTACACS server.
The VLANIF interface must already exist.

Specifies the IP address of a loopback interface as the source address for communication between the device and HWTACACS server.
The loopback interface must exist.
